no-my-nft-message: You do not have any NFTs. Let's try to make an NFT from "Make!" tab!
no-showcase-nft-message: There are no NFTs on display.
report-message: Please let us know if there is any problems with the image or text in this NFT.
display-notification-message: When the NFT is displayed, it will disappear from "My Collection" and appear in "Showcase".
